NEXT
Swiping Left or Right Swiping right allows you to like the photo. Likewise, swiping left allows you to dislike the photo. Note, you can not like or dislike your own photos.
Reporting If you happen to find a photo that offends or violates our terms of services: Click the report button and the photo will be reported and skipped so you can continue voting on other photos.
Add Your Own Photo Don\'t just like or dislike photos from others. Add your own to be voted on. Remember that each time you vote on a picture equals more photos you can upload.
Remember To Have Fun! Just don\'t think of this app as a competition app.
Our Mission We are independent developers who love fashion and seek to bring the love of fashion to everyone. Developers Tal Charnes Khuram Chaudhry Mario(marzinx3) Credits Google for the Google Libraries used Janishar Ali for the PlaceHolder Library Ben Manes for the Dependency Updates library Ravi Tamada from AndroidHive Zetra(zetbaitsu) for the Compressor Library Bump Technologies for the Glide Library Chris Banes for the PhotoView Library Ivan Arcuschin for the SimpleRatingBar Library Icons from https://icons8.com/ Tango Agency for the Avatar View Library Jacek for the EasyImage Library Something LLC.
